May 2nd, 2015
Test of temperature fragment.
X -> Y, where X is initial decimal place #, and y is final decimal place #.		

CELSIUS (10 -> 5):
20.9764956236

69.7576921225		69.75769
294.1264956236		294.1265

FAHRENHEIT (5 -> 10):
80.9467316594316

27.19263		27.1926286997
300.34263		300.3426286997

KELVIN (10 -> 5):
310.9764326946

37.8264326946		37.82643
100.0875788503		100.08758
